Detailed Description

Entry used for navigating trees of hashes.

IMPORTANT NOTE: For now we rely on external synchronization for access to internal values of this class

Member Function Documentation

SyncNodeComposite.SyncNodeElement org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.SyncTreeEntry.getCurrentElement (  ) 

Routines for getting and cycling through the references.

Returns:
SyncNodeComposite org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.SyncTreeEntry.getNode ( XMLDecoder  decoder  ) 

Decodes the hash if not yet done.

Note that this should not be called from a handler (unless we already know the node is decoded) because decoding is long and expensive and could stall the netmanager thread. We allow a separate decoder because nodes typically contain more elements than are usually allowed by default by the standard decoder. We can speed things up by preallocating more space.

Parameters:
decoder 
Returns:
static SyncTreeEntry org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.SyncTreeEntry.newLeafNode ( TreeSet< ContentName >  names  )  [static]

Create a new leaf node from the names entered.

We use only as many names as will fit into the node, and remove those names from the input list so that after this has completed, the list contains the remaining names which are not yet in a node.

Parameters:
names - the set of names in canonical order
Returns:

Returns:
entry for the new node or null if none
